title: Re: Favorite toping?
content:
I like chips with vinegar, or marmite [NOT vegemite, bleah!] Lettuce and mustard is good, as is chocolate and avocado.

More exotic options I have tried and found palatable include paprika and cinnamon, chilipowder and beef stock and lime jelly and salt [All with chips.] Chips blended with coke taste nice too.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
